CustomField.description: Indicates which approval flow to run for Standard bid sets
CustomField.formula:
IF( T_C__c = "Standard",
IF(AND( SBQQ__NetAmount__c >= 0, SBQQ__NetAmount__c < 50000), 9, IF(AND( SBQQ__NetAmount__c >= 50000, SBQQ__NetAmount__c < 400000), 8, IF(AND( SBQQ__NetAmount__c >= 400000, SBQQ__NetAmount__c < 750000), 7, IF(AND( SBQQ__NetAmount__c >= 750000, SBQQ__NetAmount__c < 1500000), 6, IF(AND( SBQQ__NetAmount__c >= 1500000, SBQQ__NetAmount__c < 3000000), 5, IF(AND( SBQQ__NetAmount__c >= 3000000, SBQQ__NetAmount__c < 6000000), 3, IF( SBQQ__NetAmount__c >= 6000000, 1, 9 ) )) ) ) )), 9)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates which approval flow to run for Standard bid sets
CustomField.label: Approval Flow: Standard Bid Set
